abstrac: Get a Free Consultation from Experienced Full Stack Developer
bio:
Hello! 
I am a Computer Science graduate with a degree in Information Technology with over 8+ years of experience building robust mobile and web applications. My clients love working with me because I am competent, responsible, and trustworthy. 

I specialize in Javascript and have extensive experience with Angular/ngRx, Vue.js/Vuex, react.js/redux, redux-thunk, redux-sagas, redux-persist, redux-actions, Node.js/Express.js, Ruby, Flask/Python, Mongodb, Postgresql, Mysql.

I have also completed advanced coursework in Deep Learning.

I am an excellent remote engineer because I work on clients’ time zone, have strong communication skills, work efficiently, and always meet or exceed expectations. Many of my remote clients have been working with me for years.

I would be happy to do a free consultation on your project to answer questions and make sure there is a good fit.

Here are some of my projects

Client: OMX- search engine for college admissions

Please contact me to listen more about my projects.

bio:

Full life cycle experience, involved in requirement analysis, design, development, testing, deployment and support. Proven success in meeting high level functional requirements and delivering on time. Excellent programming skills and over 17 years of experience with JAVA, J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Struts, Ant, ASP.NET MVC, C#, XML, XSL, JDBC, C++, PHP, Phalcon, Code Igniter, SalesForce, SOQL, Apex, OCR Technologies, Dicom, SQL, Angular, React, Bootstrap, Big Data Loading and Analysis, APIs (developing and connecting to them - RESTful and SOAP), RDBMS and server side software. Excellent interpersonal skills and Technical skills. Results oriented.

We normally take payment after the project is completed. If the project is large a milestone arrangement can be agreed upon. Depending on the project we may request that Guru Safepay Escrow be used.

We are available through phone, email and MSN. 

Availability:
We are generally available 9-5 pm EST 7 days a week. For ongoing projects we work as needed.

bio:
Hello, I do work as a Full-Stack & Full-Time Web and Mobile developer for over 10 years.

I had specialized in Enterprise Resource Planning(ERP) software development with Modularization, OOP, DRY and Database optimization technologies.

If I begin a startup project or participate in an ongoing project, first of all, intend to improve the workflow and business development:

1. Requirements (suggests more innovative and realizable ideas)
2. Technical stack (uses the Up-to-dated and Latest technologies and services)
3. Architecture model and workflow (Agile, Scrum, MVC, MVVM, OOP, DevOps)
4. Development (Version control, CI/CD pipeline, Self-testing script, Clean Code)

That's it.

- Devote over 8 hours daily to the project, about 40 hours per week.
- Collaborate with inner staffs on Teamwork environment like Slack, Skype, Jira, Trello, Basecamp, Github, Bitbucket.
- Daily or weekly update in progress projects and report bugs and improvements real-timely.
- Open the hourly contract or monthly billing agreement.

bio:
Live Deftsoft Informatics Pvt. Ltd. is a 100% export oriented unit (EOU), which aims at escalating and promoting software exports from India. We are registered with the Software Technology Parks of India (STPI), a premium society set up by the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology, Government of India. We also have an accreditation from NASSCOM, the National Association of Software and Services Companies which is a trade association of Indian Information Technology and Business Process Outsourcing Industry.

At Deftsoft, we have over 230+ skilled specialists in different fields like PHP, .NET, Android, iOS, SEO, PPC etc. and provide tailor made client centric solutions that are not only exceptional but are affordable too!

Here’s why clients prefer our services
> Global operations in more than 10 countries
> One of the Top service provider from last 14+ years
> Google Certified Partners
> Bing Accredited Professional Company
> 200+ extremely proficient IT professionals
> Accreditation from STPI & NASSCOM
> More than 1000 clients across different verticals
> Robust technological proficiency
> 24/7 availability & communication

At Deftsoft we specialize in a variety of different IT services like Mobile Application Development, Internet Marketing, Web Development, Software Development etc.

So when you choose us you can get a complete package of different services and a combined knowledge of the veterans of the IT industry!

Live Deftsoft Informatics (P) Ltd is a STPI registered and a NASSCOM accredited organization which is committed to developing and delivering customer centric IT solutions and services. Our clients include major corporations, SMEs, individuals etc.

At Deftsoft we strive to provide world class and cutting edge solutions to all our clients and that is why we constantly work hard to ensure that all our clients get nothing short of the best. Innovation and creativity is what drives us to create and provide superior software, mobile application and internet marketing solutions.

Our broad range of different services can help your organization connect with the true power of technology. With Deftsoft you can easily achieve goals that would have seemed unforeseeable in the future!

Web & Mobile Application Technologies

PHP, ASP.NET, Java, JSP, J2EE, EJB, iPhone, Android, Blackberry, Windows Mobile, Embedded Technologies

- Proficient in modern JavaScript frameworks including Next.js, React.js, and Angular

- Directed cross-functional teams comprising product, engineering, sales, and support teams to achieve successful launches of platforms and applications.

commnet: Heindrick does excellent work and is very responsive to client's needs.

bio:
"Excellent developer! Heindrick did everything I asked and went above and beyond. Anything he didn't know, he quickly researched and found a resolution immediately."

Hi, Heindrick here.
I'm a full stack software developer from Philippines.

When you work with me, we both have the same goal: Maximizing your ROI.

What I specialize in:
- FinTech
- Stock & Option Trading
- Data Processing & Visualization
- Geospatial
- Web & Hybrid App Development

I take everything I've learned, plus deep research into your business, your market, your competitors and your customers, and combine it to create wonderful product that will put more cash in your pocket from day 1.

***One warning*** If you're looking for cheap or average work... I can't help you.

I work with the type of business owner who cares about quality, because you know getting A+ work will put more money in YOUR pocket.
If that sounds like you, and you want to KNOW you're squeezing every dollar out of the effort, you've put into your business, I'm the right guy to help.

Here's what to do next:

Send me a note with a bit about your company, your track record, and your project.
If it seems like a good fit, we'll schedule a call to talk.

Best regards,
Heindrick
